topic.title: Internal error: IOError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/etc/zeronet.conf'
topic.body:
When i try to enable Tor for every connection, i got this error

how can i manally edit and enable this option

1604065269_mirrored_BruceZhang1993_githu.body: @HelloZeroNet I install zeronet from AUR on archlinux.. so have to manually edit this file  and   succeed.. thx
